findings.title: The contract should verify the validity of Chainlinkâ€™s oracle data
findings.description: The getPrice() function of PriceFeeds contract does not check the validity and freshness of the chainlink oracle's price.

findings.title: Null address checks are not present at multiple places
findings.description: The setStableAggregator() function of PriceFeeds contract and setPricingTableAddress(), setPriceFeedAddress() function of Offer smart contract do not perform validation check for null address value.
findings.location: PriceFeeds contract, setStableAggregator() function; Offer smart contract, setPricingTableAddress(), setPriceFeedAddress() functions

findings.title: _checkParams() function is missing validity check for pricingId
findings.description: The _checkParams() function in Offer smart contract misses the validity check for the pricingId variable.

findings.title: The createOffer() function accepts any address as the stableAddress variable
findings.description: The createOffer() (and reserveRefund()) function of Offer smart contract can accept any ethereum address as the OfferItem.OfferParams.stableAddress variable.
